1x02 - The Enemy of My Enemy

A top secret operative, reporting directly to the U.S. Vice President, handles high-stakes threats where speed and discretion are paramount. Hidden from the view of the public - and even from the President - there is a top secret agent who is trained and ready to serve, deployed only at the careful discretion of the Vice President.
